title: Solving for one variable
text: The first step is to pick two equations and solve for one variable.

title: Solving for one variable
text: The next step is to pick another pair of equations and solve for the same variable

title: Solving the resulting system of two equations
text: Using the resulting equations, sovle the system of two equations to find the values of those variables.

title: Back-substitution
text: Back-substitute the known variables into any one of the original equations and solve for the missing variable.
